text: Kenneth Ray "Ken" Lucas (born August 22, 1933) is an American politician. Lucas, a Democrat, was a U.S. Representative from Kentucky's 4th congressional district from 1999 until 2005. On February 2, 2009, he was appointed as Commissioner of the Kentucky Department of Veterans Affairs by Governor Steve Beshear. ==References== ==Other websites== *Entry in the Congressional Biographical Dictionary *AP story on Lucas' entry in 2006 race (from the Lexington Herald-Leader) * FEC â€” contributions to Lucas Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Kentucky Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
